descriptionHtml:
[center][size=300][color=red][b]. . : : All Black DB Armor : : . .[/b][/color][/size][/center]



[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=white][b] Changes the brown parts on the DB armor to black. Also ups the quality of the armor.[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=red][b] [/b][/color][/size]





[center][size=7][color=red][b]---> IF YOU NEED A BETTER EXPLANATION OF WHAT THIS MOD DOES JUST LOOK AT THE IMAGES SECTION <---[/b][/color][/size][/center]






[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size] 

[list]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Download the folder named \"All Black DB Armor V2\".[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Open up the archive folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Drag and drop the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Overwrite if asked.[/b][/color][/size]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Enjoy![/b][/color][/size][/list]













[center][size=300][color=#FFFC17][b][S].[U].[B].[C].[O].[N].[S].[C].[I].[O].[U].[S][/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: Subconscious
